newsitem.title: GERMANY: Analysts meeting boosts Thyssen - dealers.
newsitem.headline: Analysts meeting boosts Thyssen - dealers.

text.p: Shares in German steelmaker Thyssen AG were boosted on Friday after a meeting with analysts which traders said had a very positive outcome.
The shares ended late afternoon screen trade up 9.20 marks, or three percent, at a new year high of 320 marks. Thyssen had ended the floor session at 311.80 marks.
Meanwhile the IBIS DAX index ended up 19.12 points at 3,037.70 points, just slightly ahead of its floor trading close at 3,035.15.
Frankfurt dealers said several analysts were considering upgrading Thyssen's stock after the meeting.
